author: prbuzz.com
title: Mobirise Unveils New Free Mobile Website Builder to Boost Customer’s Web Presence
text:
[EINDHOVEN, NETHERLANDS – August 31, 2015] – Mobirise has recently announced the release of their new mobile friendly website builder package. The web design software from Mobirise, meets the needs of both personal and commercial consumers, allowing anyone to make rich, beautiful and polished websites, with no coding. The application has been especially designed to make the process of creating a basic website, quick and easy. Mobirise launched in August of 2015, with great success. The app is currently available for download for Windows, Mac, and Android. At this time, the iOS app is in beta and will be released soon.
There are a large number of people who believe that making a website is a highly technical, expensive and time consuming task. Mobirise’s web design software is aimed at breaking this myth. Mobirise makes it extremely easy to build a dynamic website that is mobile ready, without the need to create a separate mobile version of website. Visitors will see the perfectly mobile-optimized website when accessing on phones or tablets. It’s the perfect solution for those seeking to have their own professional website, without any knowledge of web design or programming. The free website maker includes a number of advanced features that allows users to cut down on the development time, and reduce the costs associated with paying for a web designer to develop their site. Additionally, the website builder enables users to customize the layout and design with ease, then preview the website directly in the visual editor. With the drag-and-drop user interface, where blocks can be dropped into the page, content can be edited and published for easy website creation.
 “The websites look modern and great! Our free website maker falls in line with the Company’s motto of providing easy to use, mobile-friendly, affordable solutions. People can set up their own personal or business website without a web designer or great technical ability. The user is not required to have technical or programming knowledge, and can simply follow the user friendly interface to build a basic website in minutes.” ~Speaking on the launch, Jorgen Baart, Product Manager~
Furthermore, Mobirise makes it possible to boost website ranking. As Google loves mobile friendly websites, sites made using Mobirise are 100% mobile-friendly “out of the box”, according to the latest Google Test. The web design software is fully responsive, and offers automatic mobile optimized websites, and is also on one of the most powerful mobile first framework, Bootstrap 3. Users can choose from a large selection of the latest pre-made blocks to include jumbotrons, full-screen hero images, scrolling with parallax effect, YouTube video backgrounds, mobile burger menu, sticky header and more. The Mobirise website builder can be published to a local drive, FTP or be hosted on Amazon S3, Google Drive, and Github, creating a number of platform and service provider options. With so many options, there is the ability to host anywhere. Mobirise is integrated with the most popular social media and e-commerce links that can be easily added to make websites interactive and vibrant. This integration allows for publishing to platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Google+.
Mobirise is available for free. The web design software is currently available for download for Windows, Mac, and Android. To learn more about the Mobirise website builder, please visit http://mobirise.com/ .
